application

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Account
      • application.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends Account
    User object class that holds a a list of albums. This is the object that is saved, causing the albums and photos to be saved recursively
    Author:
    Tim
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • readUser

        public static User readUser(java.lang.String username)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to be read in from a .dat file
        Returns:
        a user after a .dat file is created
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fails to write because of factors like file currently in use
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if trying to read a non-user file
